location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from John Kaye, Accountant General at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting invoices and receipts for thirty-six bales of woollens supplied to His Excellency Sir Gore Ouseley and seven tents for the Bagdad Residency, shipped on Captain Peter Clements's ship, [ Daedalus]. Invoices and receipts are not included.
